list_operations module

find_duplicates(lst)[source]

Returns a list of the duplicates found in lst

Parameters:

lst (list) – list of something

Returns:

list of duplicates in lst

Return type:

list

flatten(nested_list)[source]

Returns the flattened version of the nested list

Parameters:

nested_list (list) – a nested list

Returns:

a flattened list

Return type:

list
